name: (We are in) The Garden of the Forking Paths
description:
4K (3840 × 2160px) seamless loop, colour/sound, 00'14", Alexandra Crouwers, 2021.

A stand-alone reworked version of a ‘waiting room’ chapter from ‘Mistakes. The artist talk.’ (HD, colour/sound, 20'20", 2020).

‘The Garden of The Forking Paths’ is a fascinating 1941 short story by Borges suggesting multiverse quantum leaps or hypertext links. In this case, it references a non-location, a space between spaces, a multidimensional crossroads with all options open but urgent decisions to be made. The audioloop is taken from Brenda Lee’s ‘I’m sorry’, as a general apology towards all the wrong choices that brought us here.

Minted as 2x 00'14" loop. Other codecs available upon request. 'Mistakes. The artist talk' can be viewed here: https://youtu.be/pCSV9YyNKFA 

© Alexandra Crouwers / alexandracrouwers.com / T: @acrwrs / I: @alexa_crwrs
